verses.verse: When <S%G3753><s%> they drew near <S%G1448><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Bethsphage, <S%G967><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> that is opposite <S%G561><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> you will find <S%G2147><s%> a donkey <S%G3688><s%> tied, <S%G1210><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her. <S%G846><s%> Untie <S%G3089><s%> them, <S%G71><s%> and bring them to me. <S%G3427><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> says <S%G2036><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> you shall say, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G2962><s%> 'The Lord needs <S%G5532><s%> them, <S%G846><s%>' and <S%G1161><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>"

All <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> was done, <S%G1096><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"Tell <S%G2036><s%> the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Zion, <S%G4622><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> King <S%G935><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to you, <S%G4671><s%> humble, <S%G4239><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> riding <S%G1910><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a donkey, <S%G3688><s%> on a <S%G2532><s%> colt, <S%G4454><s%> the foal <S%G5207><s%> of a donkey. <S%G5268><s%>"
The <S%G1161><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> went, <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> just as <S%G2531><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> commanded <S%G4367><s%> them, <S%G846><s%>

and brought <S%G71><s%> the donkey <S%G3688><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the colt, <S%G4454><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> laid their <S%G846><s%> clothes <S%G2440><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> them; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he sat <S%G1940><s%> on them. <S%G846><s%>

A <S%G3793><s%> very great <S%G4118><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> clothes <S%G2440><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the road. <S%G1161><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> cut <S%G2875><s%> branches <S%G2798><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the trees, <S%G1186><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> them on <S%G1722><s%> the road. <S%G3598><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> who went before <S%G4254><s%> him, <S%G2532><s%> and who followed <S%G190><s%> kept <S%G2896><s%> shouting, <S%G3004><s%> "Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> to the son <S%G5207><s%> of David! <S%G1138><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he who comes <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord! <S%G2962><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the highest! <S%G5310><s%>"

When <S%G1525><s%> he <S%G846><s%> had come <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> was stirred <S%G4579><s%> up, <S%G3004><s%> saying, "Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this? <S%G3778><s%>"

The <S%G1161><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> of Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drove out <S%G1544><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of those who sold <S%G4453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> overthrew <S%G2690><s%> the money changers <S%G2855><s%>' tables <S%G5132><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the seats <S%G2515><s%> of those who sold <S%G4453><s%> the doves. <S%G4058><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "It is written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3450><s%> 'My house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer, <S%G4335><s%>' but <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> have made <S%G4160><s%> it <S%G846><s%> a den <S%G4693><s%> of robbers! <S%G3027><s%>"

The <S%G2532><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the lame <S%G5560><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1492><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> the wonderful things <S%G2297><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he did, <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the children <S%G3816><s%> who were crying <S%G2896><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> to the son <S%G5207><s%> of David! <S%G1138><s%>" they were indignant, <S%G23><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Do you <S%G191><s%> hear what <S%G5101><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are saying? <S%G3004><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Yes. <S%G3483><s%> Did you <S%G314><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> read, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1537><s%> 'Out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of babes <S%G3516><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nursing babies <S%G2337><s%> you have perfected <S%G2675><s%> praise? <S%G136><s%>'"

He <S%G2532><s%> left <S%G2641><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G1854><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lodged <S%G835><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> in the morning, <S%G4405><s%> as he returned <S%G1877><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> he was hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

Seeing <S%G1492><s%> a <S%G1520><s%> fig tree <S%G4808><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> the road, <S%G3598><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> on <S%G3361><s%> it <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1487><s%> leaves. <S%G5444><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to it, <S%G846><s%> "Let <S%G1096><s%> there be <S%G1096><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G4675><s%> forever! <S%G165><s%>" Immediately <S%G3916><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> withered away. <S%G3583><s%>

When <S%G1492><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, <S%G2296><s%> they marveled, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> did <S%G3583><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> wither away? <S%G3583><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "Most certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> doubt, <S%G1252><s%> you will <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> was done to the fig tree, <S%G4808><s%> but <S%G235><s%> even if <S%G2579><s%> you told <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> <S%G142><s%> 'Be taken up and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%>' it would be done. <S%G1096><s%>
All <S%G2532><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> you <S%G302><s%> ask <S%G154><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> prayer, <S%G4335><s%> believing, <S%G4100><s%> you will receive. <S%G2983><s%>"

When <S%G2064><s%> he <S%G846><s%> had come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> as he was teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "By <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> do you <S%G4160><s%> do these things? <S%G5023><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> authority? <S%G1849><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "I also <S%G2504><s%> will ask <S%G2065><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> question, <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you tell <S%G2036><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> I likewise <S%G2504><s%> will tell <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

The baptism <S%G908><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> was it <S%G2258><s%> from? <S%G1537><s%> From heaven <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> men? <S%G444><s%>" They <S%G1161><s%> reasoned <S%G1260><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> we say, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G1537><s%> 'From heaven, <S%G3772><s%>' he will ask <S%G2036><s%> us, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Why then <S%G3767><s%> did you <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>'

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we say, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G1537><s%> 'From men, <S%G444><s%>' we fear <S%G5399><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> hold <S%G2192><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>"

They answered <S%G611><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> "We <S%G1492><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> know. <S%G846><s%>" He also said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Neither <S%G3761><s%> will I <S%G1473><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G5213><s%> think? <S%G1380><s%> A man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons, <S%G5043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G4334><s%> to the first, <S%G4413><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5043><s%> 'Son, go <S%G5217><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> today <S%G4594><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> vineyard. <S%G290><s%>'
He answered, <S%G611><s%> <S%G2036><s%> 'I will <S%G2309><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%>' but <S%G1161><s%> afterward <S%G5305><s%> he changed <S%G3338><s%> his mind, <S%G565><s%> and went.

He <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to the second, <S%G1208><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> the same thing. <S%G5615><s%> He answered, <S%G611><s%> <S%G1473><s%> 'I go, <S%G2962><s%> sir,' but <S%G2532><s%> he didn't <S%G3756><s%> go. <S%G565><s%>

Which <S%G5101><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of his father? <S%G3962><s%>" They said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "The first. <S%G4413><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Most certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the tax collectors <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prostitutes <S%G4204><s%> are entering <S%G4254><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you didn't <S%G3756><s%> believe him, <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the tax collectors and <S%G2532><s%> the prostitutes <S%G4204><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it, <S%G5210><s%> you didn't <S%G3756><s%> even repent <S%G3338><s%> afterward, <S%G5305><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> you might believe <S%G4100><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

"Hear <S%G191><s%> another <S%G243><s%> parable. <S%G444><s%> There was <S%G2258><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> who was a master of a household, <S%G3617><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> a vineyard, <S%G290><s%> set <S%G2532><s%> a hedge <S%G5418><s%> about <S%G4060><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> dug <S%G3736><s%> a winepress <S%G3025><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> a tower, <S%G4444><s%> leased <S%G1554><s%> it <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1554><s%> to farmers, <S%G1092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went into another country. <S%G589><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> the season <S%G2540><s%> for the fruit <S%G2590><s%> drew near, <S%G1448><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the farmers, <S%G1092><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

The farmers <S%G1092><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> beat <S%G1194><s%> one, <S%G3303><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> another, <S%G3739><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> stoned <S%G3036><s%> another. <S%G3739><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> other <S%G243><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than the first: <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they treated <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> the same way. <S%G5615><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> afterward he sent <S%G649><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%> his <S%G846><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1788><s%> 'They will respect my <S%G3450><s%> son. <S%G5207><s%>'

But <S%G1161><s%> the farmers, <S%G1092><s%> when <S%G1492><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> the son, <S%G5207><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3778><s%> 'This is <S%G2076><s%> the heir. <S%G2818><s%> Come, <S%G1205><s%> let <S%G615><s%>'s kill him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seize <S%G2722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> inheritance. <S%G2817><s%>'
So <S%G2532><s%> they took <S%G2983><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and threw <S%G1544><s%> him out <S%G1854><s%> of the vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> killed him. <S%G615><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> will he do <S%G4160><s%> to <S%G1092><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> farmers? <S%G1092><s%>"

They told <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "He will <S%G622><s%> miserably <S%G2560><s%> destroy <S%G622><s%> those <S%G846><s%> miserable men, <S%G2556><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will lease out <S%G1554><s%> the vineyard <S%G290><s%> to <S%G1092><s%> other <S%G243><s%> farmers, <S%G1092><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> will give <S%G591><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> its <S%G846><s%> season. <S%G2540><s%>"
